edu.cnm.deepdive.ironorimgtransform.service

Class TransformOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.ironorimgtransform.service.TransformOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaussianBlur

    public abstract class TransformOperation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Classes of Transform entities extend this class so that individual transform types are forced to inherit and thus implement the transform(Bitmap, View) method and the getLayout() method. This class provides for a convenient means by which new transform types can be added to the app.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransformOperation() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLayout()
      Returns layout id so that the appropriate transform type layout is called.
      Bitmap transform(Bitmap src, View view)
      This method provides Bitmap and the View necessary for a particular transform operation to transform.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public Bitmap transform(Bitmap src,
                        View view)
        This method provides Bitmap and the View necessary for a particular transform operation to transform.
        Parameters:
        src - the Bitmap to be transformed.
        view - the needed user interface components.
        Returns:
        a bitmap

      • getLayout

        public int getLayout()
        Returns layout id so that the appropriate transform type layout is called.
        Returns:
        an integer representing a layout id.
